TopicTitle: Hello, I'm the deconstructor fleet of KSP tropes

Articles.Content: Hello! I've been playing since 0.17 and I've already posted a bit on the forums, but now I am officially introducing myself. I am gutza1, 12 years old, and I don't accept many of the "fanon" stuff such as kerbal photosynthesis and bouncy heads(it's only a bug, not canon). I, therefore use tons of mods. I am also a realism fan, and am temped to use a RSS rescaled Kerbol system for my future LP so I don't have to talk about nutronium cores or other applied phlebonium:D to explain the really small planets. I am also trying to use PlanetFactory to recreate GP2, GP3, and to create GP4 and a Pluto analogue named Bluto(rate this thread well if you get the reference:cool:). Cheers!

KSP doesn't really have a story or characters. pretty much everything is fanon from what I can tell (other than bill bob and jeb's braveness and dumbness scores, I think that was just Harv) You should see all the crazy art chobit came up with! Welcome to the forums.

Edited January 21, 2014 by nhnifong
Hey there! Welcome to the KSP forums Seems we don't live to far from one another xD
